shape.description: There are two types of avatars: circle and square
shape.description_zh: 头像的形状，有圆形(circle)和正方形(square)两种

image-url.description: Customize the address of the avatar image, if this attribute is passed, the img tag will be rendered by default
image-url.description_zh: 自定义头像图片地址，如果传入该属性，会默认渲染img标签

:size.description: The size of the avatar in px. If not filled, use the size of 40px in the style
:size.description_zh: 头像的尺寸大小，单位是 px。未填写时使用样式中的大小 40px

auto-fix-font-size.description: Whether the font size is automatically adjusted according to the size of the avatar
auto-fix-font-size.description_zh: 是否自动根据头像尺寸调整字体大小

trigger-type.description: Types of avatar interactions that can be clicked
trigger-type.description_zh: 可点击的头像交互类型

:trigger-icon-style.description: The style of the interaction icon

:object-fit.description: The type of adaptation of the picture inside the container
:object-fit.description_zh: 图片在容器内的的适应类型

slots.name: trigger-icon
slots.description: 可点击的头像交互图标
slots.description_zh: 可点击的头像交互图标
